verses.text: He stands first in time, He stands first in time, He stands first in time; Be there on time, be there on time, Be there on time.
The planets in their course, One moment tarry not, All things that ever were to run, Are into order brought, Seem lost to haste! have you-all, The broad and meadow wander?
Shall man alone of all The vast creation round, All things that ever were to run, Are into order brought, Seem lost to haste! have you-all, The broad and meadow wander?
